site_name: Flower Stall On Pavement Facing Entrance To Junction Shopping Centre
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This development shall be temporary for a period of 2 (two) years from the date of this permission. The development shall be removed from its location and the highways restored to the surrounding condition upon expiry of the permitted 2 (two) years. 
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The premises shall be used as a florist for selling flowers and for no other 
purpose (including any other purpose in Class E of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987(as amended), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and reenacting that Order with or without modification). 
Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the neighbourhood by ensuring that other uses which could cause a loss of amenity do not commence without prior approval in accordance with policies LP1, LP2 and LP14 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (2023).

Condition : 3 - The development shall be removed from the site and the condition of the 
highway restored to that as seen surrounding the development if at any time 
within the 2 (two) year lifespan of the permission the development is no longer being used as a florist for the selling of flowers.
Reason: To comply with policies LP1, LP2 and LP14 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023.
Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE: In dealing with this application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive manner and the Council has, as far as practicable, sought solutions to problems arising in relation to dealing with the planning application. The Council has made available detailed advice in the form of its statutory policies in the Local Plan (2023) as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. In addition, where appropriate, further guidance was offered to the applicant during the processing of the application.
description: Retention of the existing flower stall for a temporary period of 5 years.
